fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Single market, External Relations, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Capital standards 
G-20/regulatory coordination 
Securities regulation 
Trade 
UK withdrawal from the European Union

MiFID II 
GDPR
organisation_name: Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association (SIFMA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: SIFMA is a member of the Global Financial Markets Association (GFMA) and International Council of Securities Associations (ICSA).
goals__remit: SIFMA is the leading trade association representing the broker-dealers, banks and asset managers who provide access to the global capital markets. We serve our members as the principal advocate before policymakers, regulators, the media and the public on all matters involving the retail and institutional capital markets. We are the go-to resource for expert information about the capital markets and a forum for industry policy and professional development.
